Por tal razón Jhon quiere solicitar un préstamo para completar el dinero que necesita para terminar su negocio y comprar los computadores para iniciar rápidamente con su negocio.

Jhon no solo trabajara para pagar cuentas, busca pagar sus estudios y convertirse en un profesional, convirtiéndose en el primer profesional de su familia y dando ejemplo para que los demás se animen a estudiar.
texts.en:
Jhon is 25 years old, young and single. He is a hardworking person who wants a better future for himself and his family. He can be seen working on their premises, as he'll start an Internet cafe and you can help give him the last push that he needs to mount the business, which will become the financial support of their home.

For this reason, Jhon wants to request a loan to complete the money he needs in order to start up his business and purchase the computers to start quickly with his business.

Jhon not only works to pay his bills, he also wants to pay for his studies and is looking to become a professional, becoming the first professional in his family and to set an example for others to encourage them to study.

loans.use: to purchase the computers to quickly start up with his business.

loans.name: Luis Alfonso

texts.es:
Comprar vivieres en general para su tienda aumentando su variedad de productos de la canasta familiar es el objetivo que tiene el señor Luis Alfonso quien tiene una tienda de abarrotes y gracias a esta mantiene a su familia conformada por su esposa y 4 hijos.


Luis Alfonso es un hombre de 59 años de edad, su tienda es la única entrada de dinero, por ello solicita préstamo que le ayuden a mantener su negocio en el mercado y genera la suficiente utilidad para brindarle una buena vida a sus familiares.


Su sueño es continuar ejerciendo su profesión por muchos años y con esta mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.
texts.en:
The objective of Mr Luis ALfonso is to buy groceries for his store in order to increase its range of goods and products. He has a grocery store and thanks to this is able to support his family, which consists of his wife and 4 children.

Luis Alfonso is 59 years old, and his shop is his only source income. Because of that, he asks for a loan to help keep his business in the market and generate enough income to provide a good life for his family.

His dream is to continue exercising his profession for many years and with this improve the condition of his home.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for his grocery store.

loans.name: Torotich

texts.en:
Torotich is a smallholder farmer residing in Kipsaiya division, Kenya. He is mainly into crop farming but also has enough invested in livestock farming. His strength as a horticultural farmer lies in his ability to predict changing weather patterns.

Torotich needs external financing to buy agricultural inputs and implements to enhance his farm’s productivity. The main challenge he is facing is lack of financial products tailored for his kind of business. However, through Juhudi Kilimo, he is now able to access loans with suitable and flexible terms from Kiva.

Torotich is seeking a loan to buy improved seeds, fertilizers and other important inputs such as pesticides and herbicides. Your loan will help Torotich acquire agricultural inputs necessary for a successful harvest and quality yields.

Income from this investment will help him to meet his obligations as the head of the family and family business.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs

loans.name: Ivis Paola

texts.es:
Generar dignidad y calidad de vida, comprar una vivienda son los motivos que impulsaron a la señora Ivis a iniciar su negocio de cría de ganado porcino. Actividad que aprendió de su conyugue y la cual labora 5 horas todos los días de la semana.

Ivis tiene un hijo de 9 años de edad, en el principio le costó su negocio ya que no sabía manejar la fuerte competencia y el bajo precio de venta de los productos, pero ya que tiene conocimiento y experiencia ha logrado acomodarse y hacerse un hueco en el mercado.

Ivis quiere solicitar un préstamo para dinamizar y aumentar la producción en su negocio, dicho capital será invertido de la siguiente manera:
•	Arreglos y/o remodelación del local
•	Compra de cerdos de levante
•	Comprar 10 bultos de cuido
texts.en:
To create dignity, improve her quality of life, and to purchase a home are the reasons that prompted Ivis to begin her business raising pigs. She learned this activity from her husband and she works 5 hours every day of the week.

Ivis has a 9-year-old child. In the beginning, her business was difficult since she did not know how to manage the strong competition and the low selling-prices of the products, but since she now has the knowledge and experience, she has been able to adjust and put a dent in the market.

Ivis wants to apply for a loan to streamline and increase the production in her business. This capital will be invested in the following way:
•	Repairs and/or remodeling of her establishment.
•	The purchase of pigs to raise.
•	To purchase 10 packages of animal feed.

loans.use: to complete the repairs of her establishment, to purchase pigs, and to purchase packages of animal feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy farm inputs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy farm inputs

loans.name: Nelda

texts.en:
Nelda is 53 years old and married with six children, one of whom is in school.

She earns a living by raising chickens in the Philippines. Nelda is borrowing PHP 25000 through NWTF to buy additional feed and vitamins for the chickens.

Nelda has been raising chickens  for 3 years and also earns additional income from raising pigs.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to  save enough money so she could afford to send her child to college.

loans.use: to buy additional feed and vitamins

loans.name: Ingrid

texts.en:
Ingrid is 38 years old and married with one child in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

She has a bakery business in the Philippines. Ingrid requested a PHP 35000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients like sugar, milk, flour,yeast, etc. for her bakery.

Ingrid has been in this business for 7 years. In the future, Ingrid would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients like sugar, milk, flour,yeast, etc for her bakery.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia works hard to support her family. Virginia is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF to purchase an additional bundle of fishing net, gasoline, bamboo, etc for her fishing business.

Virginia has been in this business for 3 years now.

In the future, Virginia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase an additional bundle of fishing net, gasoline, bamboo, etc for her fishing business

loans.name: Lucia Guillermina

texts.es:
El ambiente familiar y un hogar acogedor, son los principales atractivos de la casa de Lucia, una comerciante de 59 años de edad, que ha trabajado durante veinte años comprando y vendiendo ropa, joyas y zapatos, para salir adelante como madre soltera de sus tres hijos, jóvenes que ahora son independientes y ayudan a su madre. 
El trabajo duro por tantos años, ha llevado a Lucia a cuidar mucho de su familia, poniéndolos de primero que ella. Ahora ella siente que es una oportunidad de cuidar más de ella y de sus nietos, por lo que desea mejorar su servicio higiénico. De manera que solicita un préstamo para comprar cemento, tuberías, inodoro, ducha, azulejos, entre otros materiales indispensables para construir su baño. Esta oportunidad le permitirá evitar enfermedades y accidentes debido al sumidero que usa como baño. Ella sueña con cumplir ya con ese sueño que desde hace mucho tiempo lo desea.
texts.en:
The family atmosphere and a cozy home are the main attractions of Lucia’s house. She is a 59-year-old merchant who has worked for twenty years purchasing and selling clothing, jewelry, and shoes, to get ahead as a single mother of her three children, youths who now are independent and help their mother.

The hard work for so many years has led Lucia to care a lot for her family, putting them ahead of herself. Now, she feels that this is an opportunity to take better care of herself and her grandchildren, for which she hopes to improve her lavatory. 

For that, she is requesting a loan to purchase cement, pipes, a toilet, a shower, and tiles, among other materials that are indispensable to construct her bathroom. This opportunity will allow her to avoid disease and accidents owing to the gully she uses as a bathroom. She dreams of completing this dream that she has desired for a long time.

loans.use: to purchase cement, pipes, a toilet, a shower, and tiles, among other materials.

loans.name: Jenyfer  Lourdes

texts.es:
Materiales didactas adornan la librería de Jenyfer, una joven emprendedora de 22 años de edad que desde hace más de dos años decidió establecer su pequeño negocio en pro de la educación. Ella señala que además de brindarle ingresos para cuidar como madre soltera de un hijo de cuatro años de edad, les da la oportunidad a niños y jóvenes de comprar sus materiales escolares a un precio accesible. 
Afortunadamente Jenyfer cuenta con el apoyo de sus padres y tiene como ingreso extra la venta de ropa interior, por lo que se siente segura de que va a llegar muy lejos con su negocio. Por esta razón, no duda en invertir en su librería y solicita un préstamo para comprar cuadernos, pega, lápices, cartulinas, marcadores, entre otros materiales necesarios en el ámbito escolar. Esto le permitirá llenar su negocio de productos y llegar a más estudiantes. En sus planes está vender manualidades y extender su librería.
texts.en:
Educational materials adorn Jenyfer's bookstore. She is a young 22-year-old entrepreneur, who decided to establish her own small business over two years ago, in the education sector. She says that on top of providing her an income to take care of her four-year-old as a single mother, her business gives children and youth an opportunity to buy school supplies at an accessible price.
Fortunately, Jenyfer has her parents' support, and she sells underwear as an extra source of income. For these reasons, she is certain that she will go much further with her business. So, she has no qualms about investing in her bookstore. She is requesting a loan for the purchase of notebooks, glue, pencils, poster board, markers, and other school supplies. This will allow her to fill her business with products and reach more students. She plans to start selling handicrafts and to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, glue, pencils, poster board, markers, and other items.

loans.name: Luz Deibis

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer de 32 años de edad, junto con su esposo conforma un sólido grupo familiar en la que esperan que con el pasar del tiempo se unan uno o dos integrantes más (hijos).

Ella ha sido una mujer que se caracteriza por ser autosuficiente, no le gusta que la mantengan, ella misma genera sus recursos gracias a su negocio de alquiler de lavadoras.

La inseguridad en la zona, debido a robos, vacunas de grupos ilegales hace que la profesión se complique, pero de momento tienen que vivir de esta manera hasta que las autoridades competentes regulen este problema.

Su sueño es poder tener un hogar propio y nos hijos que puedan acceder a la universidad.

Luz quiere solicitar un préstamo para reponer lavadoras que debido a la delincuencia perdió.
texts.en:
Luz is a 32-year-old woman. She and her husband are united, and with time they hope to add two more members to their unit (children).
Luz is self-sufficient and doesn't like accepting help. She generates her own income through her laundry business.
The area is insecure. There are robbers and gangs. This complicates her work, but at this time she and her husband have to live this way until the authorities regulate the problem.
Her dream is to be able to have her own home, and to have two children who are able to go to university.
Luz is requesting a loan to replace washing machines that she lost due to crime.

loans.use: to buy washing machines.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a freezer.

loans.name: Saida

texts.en:
Saida is a divorced woman and has been blessed with three children, all of whom attend school. Together with her children, she lives at her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

She has operated a fish selling business for over one year, selling from her home to restaurant operators and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality and perishability, which lead to losses.

With this 10,000 KES loan, she wants to purchase bundles of fish to resell. She dreams of expanding her business and establishing another business in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of fish to resell.

loans.name: Kadama

texts.en:
Kadama is a widowed woman and has been blessed with three children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

She has operated a fish-selling business for over two years, selling from home to restaurant operators and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality and perishability leading to losses.

With the KES 10,000 she wants to purchase bundles of fish for resale. She dreams of expanding her business and establishing another business in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of fish for resale.

loans.name: Jose Arbey

texts.es:
José es uno de las personas residentes del sector de Urrao que gracias al emprendimiento, al apoyo de créditos ha logrado sacar su familia adelante.
Él un hombre de 37 años de edad el cual está felizmente casado y fruto del matrimonio nació un hijo que ahora tiene 8 años de edad y un sueño gigante de ser profesional el cual José quiere cumplir.
Trabajo vendiendo frutas y verduras, su negocio es simple, tiene una esquina donde ubica estantería, una nevera y una báscula.
Con el ánimo de mejorar sus ingreso, ampliar su inventario y disponer de capital de trabajo para comprar productos los cuales por su rápida fecha de caducidad deben renovarse continuamente, José quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de verduras y frutas en general, tales como plátano, yuca, tomate, cebolla, cilantro etc.
texts.en:
José is one of the residents of the Urrao sector who, thanks to loans, has been able to get his family ahead.
He is a 37-year-old man, happily married with an 8-year-old child who dreams of being a professional; José wants to make this happen.
He sells fruits and vegetables. His business is simple; he has a stand, fridge, and scale on a street corner.
With a desire to improve his income and expand his inventory in order to have working capital, he is requesting a loan. His produce expires quickly so he needs working capital. He will use this loan to purchase fruits and vegetables such as bananas, yucca, tomato, onion, and cilantro.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables such as bananas, yucca, tomato, onion, and cilantro.

loans.name: Munyozi

texts.en:
Munyozi is a married woman with five children, all of whom attend school. She lives at a house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

She has operated a retail shop business for the past year, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of creditors staying for long to repay for goods taken on credit. 

With the loan, she is requesting she wants to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour

loans.name: Gloria Elena

texts.es:
Gloria es una madre cabeza de familia de 54 años de edad, una mujer que toda la vida estuvo entregada a sus hijos y esposo, pero al separarse de este último, inicio a vivir una crisis económica en su hogar.
Para buscar una salida Gloria recordó los conocimientos que le inculco su madre acerca de la cría y levante de pollos y decidió convertir esta actividad en su medio de sustento y el de su familia conformada por 3 hijos que hoy en día son adolescentes.

Si le preguntan a Gloria cuál es su mayor sueño, ella responde que comprar una vivienda propia y recordar este anhelo la motivo y la incentivo a aumentar la producción en su negocio, por ello solicita un préstamo para la compra de pollos, y alimento de engorde para pollos.
texts.en:
Gloria is a 54-year-old mother and head of household. She devoted her whole life to her children and her husband, but upon separating from the latter her  household experienced a financial crisis. Looking for a way out, Gloria recalled the things her mother taught her about the breeding and raising of chickens and decided to make this her means of support for her family which today consists of three teenagers. 

When asked what her biggest dream is, Gloria responds that she would like to buy her own home. Remembering this wish gave her a motive and an incentive to increase her business's production, and for that reason she is asking for a loan so she can buy chickens and feed for fattening them.

loans.use: to buy chickens and chicken feed.

loans.name: Carlos Mario

texts.es:
Carlos Mario es un hombre de 58 años de edad, felizmente casado, una persona emprendedora, trabajadora, que gusta ser comerciante independiente, manejar sus tiempos.

Carlos lleva con su negocio ya 30 años, es una cafetería tradicional, con clientes establecidos y que está ajustándose a las nuevas tendencias y productos que vemos hoy en día.

Su propósito central es dejar el negocio a sus hijos, ya que este cuenta con un recorrido de 30 años en el mercado.

Buscando abastecer su negocio, Carlos quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de gaseosa, cerveza y snacks.
texts.en:
Carlos Mario is a 58-year-old, happily married man. He is enterprising, hard-working and likes being an independent businessman so he can manage his own time. 

Carlos has had his business for 30 years. It is a traditional snack bar with regular customers, and he is adjusting to the new tendencies and products that are prevalent today. His main goal is to leave the business to his children as it has a 30-year history. Looking to stock his business, Carlos is asking for a loan so he can buy soda, beer, and snacks.

loans.use: to buy soda, beer and snacks.

loans.name: Herculano

texts.pt:
Senhor Herculano tem 57 anos de idade, casado, pai de 5 filhos dos quais 4 estão na sua responsabilidade, é mecânico, vive na casa própria com a sua família.
O montante financiado será aplicado para a compra de cimento, varões, areia, blocos, pedra para construção de dependências.
No futuro pretende ajudar os filhos a construir casas próprias visto que não conseguem se estabelecer financeiramente por falta de emprego.
O seu desafio e de ver sua família vivendo livre da pobreza absoluta, pelo que esta trabalhando seriamente alcançar o desejado.
texts.en:
Herculano is 57 years old, married and the father of five children of whom four are under his care. He is a mechanic and lives in his own home with his family.

This loan will be used to buy cement, rods, sand, blocks and stones to build homes for his children.

In the future he hopes to help his children to build their own homes since they haven't been able to set themselves up financially as they don't have a job.

Herculano's challenge is to see his family living free from absolute poverty, which is why he is working hard to achieve his goal.

loans.use: to buy cement, rods, sand, blocks and stones to build homes for his children

loans.name: Uber Alonso

texts.es:
Uber es un hombre soltero de 29 años de edad que se dedica a prestar servicios de confección a terceros, su empresa genera la increíble cantidad de 6 empleos, increíble ya que solo lleva dos años de a ver iniciado como emprendedor esta actividad la cual aprendió trabajando en otras empresas.

Su capacidad de relacionarse, su perseverancia para buscar clientes y su calidad de producto hacen que tenga trabajo constante y ahora se proyecta para hacer crecer su empresa con un empleo más, pero para ello solicita tu apoyo en un préstamo que quiere realizar para la compra de una máquina de confección y compra de hilos que es su insumo principal.

Su principal sueño es poder comprar una vivienda propia, así que anímate, participa en el proyecto de Uber, tu préstamo ayudara a dos personas
texts.en:
Uber is a single man, 29 years old, who works providing sewing services to third parties.  His company has the incredible quantity of 6 employees.  It is incredible because it has only been two years since he began as an entrepreneur in this occupation, which he learned from working at other companies.

His ability to connect with others, his perseverance in looking for clients and the quality of the product have made for constant work.  Now, he is planning to grow his business with one more employee, but in order to do that he is asking your support for a loan to buy a sewing machine and to buy thread, which is his main consumable item.

His principal dream is to be able to buy his own home. Come on, participate in Uber's project—your loan will be helping two people.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and to buy thread, which is his main consumable item.

loans.name: Cesar Emilio

texts.es:
Cesar es un humilde trabajador de  la ciudad de Medellín, se desempeña como vendedor en una chaza, oferta snacks, cerveza y refrescos.

Cesar es soltero solo tiene su negocio para apoyarse y a pesar de que no genera la utilidad suficiente para comprar grandes lujos es feliz con lo que vive y ha podido sacar adelante su hogar y reformarlo poco a poco.

Su meta a largo plazo es comprar la vivienda donde tiene ubicado la tienda, un proyecto a largo plazo.

Cesar quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de surtido de productos en general, cerveza, refrescos, snacks, chocolates y gomas de mascar.
texts.en:
Cesar is a humble worker in the city of Medellin.  He works as a vendor at a ballpark.  He offers snacks, beer and sodas.
Cesar is single.  He has his business only to support himself and, despite the fact the he does not generate enough income to buy great luxuries, he is happy with how he lives and he has been able to improve his home and remodel it bit by bit.
His long-term goal is to buy the residence where his shop is located, a long-term project.
Cesar wants to request a loan to buy an assortment of general products, beer, sodas, snacks, chocolates, and chewing gum.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of general products, beer, sodas, snacks, chocolates, and chewing gum.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en: Helen is operating a sari-sari store (convenience store) at her place in Poblacion, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. Helen hopes to live comfortably in a house and that is why she is determined to save her income from her sari-sari store, supported. Recently, she availed herself of a loan of PHP 5,000. She hopes to maintain her membership in good standing, with a good repayment record -- a matter that she has given a priority to, as a microfinance member of PMPC. This is why she is thankful, for after all, her financing needs on her retailing business have been supported by PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase groceries, soft drinks and canned goods for her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Angel Saul

texts.es: Angel tiene 35 años de edad es casado tiene 3 hijos y vive en Guaranda provincia de Bolivar  en la comunidad nueva esperanza Visote, el se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado, solicita en crédiro para la compra de ganado tener un tiempo engordandoles y para luego venderlos, gracias a este crédito podra mejorar su negocio y tener mas ganancias, realiza las compras en Guaranda y vende en el mercado de la misma cuidad, su sueño es que sus hijos tengan una buena educación, el desafio al que se enfrenta es la competencia, en su tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en: Angel is 35 years old. married and has three children. He lives in Guaranda, in the province of Bolivar, in a community called Nueva Esperanza Visote. He works buying and selling cattle. He is requesting a loan to buy cattle to keep for a while and fatten and then sell them. Thanks to this loan he can improve his business and make more profit. He will make his purchases in Guaranda and sell in the market of the same city. Hie dream is for his children to get a good education. The challenge he faces is competition. He likes to play sports in his spare time.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: María Auxiliadora

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito María Del Carmen se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla, ciudad de clima fresco y con muchos atractivos turísticos naturales propios de la zona.
En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 44 años de edad está casada y de  esta relación tiene un hijo de 11 años que  estudia en escuela. Su esposo es obrero.
Doña María es una mujer que siempre le ha gustado  trabajar por el bien de su familia, ella  se dedica a la venta de pescado, todos los días en la mañana ella compra el pescado a comerciantes mayoristas que le entregan en su casa ya sea por piezas grandes los mismos que  luego sale a vender por libras en un  triciclo por toda la ciudad, ella tiene muchos clientes que siempre le compran ya que les da el peso justo y a buen precio, lleva  más de 17 años en este negocio el cual le permite ganar lo suyo y así ayudar a su marido a salir adelante.
Este crédito es para comprar pescado. Lleva más de 7 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por los beneficios que la institución les ofrece. Sus sueños son tener un local.
texts.en:
The "María Del Carmen" communal bank meets every fifteen days in the Montecristi subdivision, where the famous straw hats come from. The city has a cold climate with many natural tourist attractions particular to the area. Maria lives in this place. She is a 44 year-old married woman with an 11 year-old son who goes to school. Her husband is a laborer.

María is a woman who has always liked to work for the good of her family. She sells fish. Every morning she buys fish from wholesale merchants who deliver the product, even if it is big pieces, to her house. She then goes out all over the city on a tricycle to sell it by the pound. She has many clients who always buy from her since she gives them the right weight at a good price. She has been engaged in this business for 17 years, which allows her to earn a living and thus help her husband get ahead. 

This loan is for buying fish. She has been in the communal bank for seven years and likes it because of the benefits the institution provides. Her dream is to have a store.

loans.use: to purchase fish.

loans.name: María Orfilia

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito María Del Carmen se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla, ciudad de clima fresco y con muchos atractivos turísticos naturales propios de la zona.
En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 73 años de edad, hace algunos años su esposo falleció y quedo viuda pero de esta relación tuvo 6 hijos mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun viven con ella. 
Doña María es una mujer muy trabajadora que después de la muerte de su marido junto a su hijo siguen realizando la labor que el desempeñaba para salir adelante, ella y su hijo se dedican a la  compra y venta de pescado por libras, ellos  se desplazan hasta las playas de Manta lugar en el cual compran a muy buen precio, para  luego salir a vender por la ciudad en su carro, trabajan todos los días y llevan  más de 14 años en esta actividad que les ha permitido salir adelante con un trabajo honrando. 
Este crédito es para comprar pescado para la venta. Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le permiten salir adelante. Sus sueños son tener un local.
texts.en:
The credit group Maria Del Carmen meets every two weeks in the Montecristi Canton, place of the famous, shawl straw hats and a city with a temperate climate with many natural tourist attractions of the region.
Maria, 73, lives in this place.  Several years ago, her husband died and she was left a widow, but from this union she had six children who are all grown.  One of them still lives with her.
Maria is a hard-working woman, who after the death of her husband together with her son continued the work that they perform in order to forge ahead.  She and her son make a living in the purchase and sales of fish by the pound.  They travel to the beaches of Manta, the place where they buy at good prices in order to later go and sell throughout the city from their car.  They work every day and they have been doing this for more than 14 years which allows them to get ahead with honest work.
This loan is for buying fish for sale.  She has been with the credit group since its inception and she likes it because the loans allow her to keep going.  Her dream is to have a locale.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en: Teresita has high hopes for living comfortably. She works hard on her farming activities to achieve the life she wishes. She borrowed from PMPC the amount of PHP 15,000 to purchase bags of fertilizer for her farm so that she can increase her corn production for this cropping season. She hopes to maintain her membership in good standing with a good repayment record - a matter to which Teresita has given a priority as a microfinance member of PMPC. This is what she is thankful for, after all her financing needs for her farming business were supported by PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer for farming.

loans.name: Jeffrol

texts.en:
Jeffrol works hard to support her family. Jeffrol is married and has a business buying and selling rice in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell.

Jeffrol has been in this business for three years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Allyn

texts.en:
Allyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling fish in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 27000 through NWTF to buy additional fishing nets for her business.

Allyn has been in this business for 13 years. Allyn earns more income from food vending.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing nets.

loans.name: Allyn

texts.en:
Allyn is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Allyn is 34 years old and has two children currently in school.

Allyn has a retail business in the Philippines. Allyn requested a PHP 8000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stock of personal items such as body lotion, cosmetics, perfume, beauty soap. etc.

Allyn has been in this business for 3 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase stock of personal items such as body lotion, cosmetics, perfume, beauty soap, etc.

loans.name: Maria Ruby

texts.es:
María es una mujer separada de 59 años de edad que se dedica atender un negocio de tienda de abarrotes, actividad que adopto por necesidad económica ya que se separó de su esposo.

Esta gran mujer no le quedo grande hacerse con los gastos del hogar, tomo un pequeño capital que tenía, inicio una venta de productos de la canasta familiar de primera necesidad y conforme avanzaba, iba pidiendo préstamos para vender cada vez más mercancía.

Ahora María otra vez quiere recurrir a un préstamo, que le han ayudado tanto para crecer, esta vez el motivo es que quiere comprar surtido de bebidas alcohólicas como lo son cerveza, aguardiente y ron, productos de mucho consumo en Antioquia.

Su sueño es tener sostenibilidad del negocio, salud para trabajar y mejorar día a día las condiciones de la vivienda.
texts.en:
Maria is a single 59 year old woman who makes a living working a grocery store, which she started doing out of economic necessity since she separated with her husband.

She is a good woman who wasn't left much to take care of home expenses, took what small capital she had, and began selling basic household items and as time progressed, she began applying for loans in order to sell more merchandise. 

Now, Maria once again wants to utilize a loan, which have helped her so much in growing, this time the motive is the desire to buy a supply of alcoholic beverages such as beer, brandy, and rum, which are popular drinks in Antioquia.

Her dream is for her business to be sustainable, to have good health in order to work and improve the conditions of her home on a daily basis.

loans.use: To purchase a supply of alcoholic beverages like beer, rum, brandy, popular drinks in Antioquia.

loans.name: Maria Edilma

texts.es:
Ella es María es una mujer de 50 años de edad que se dedica a la confección directa. 

Tiene una familia conformada por su esposo y dos hijos adolescentes, trabaja 6 días a la semana 4 horas por día ya que su negocio lo alterna con las labores de ama de casa.

Inicio su negocio por necesidad económica, en su hogar pasaban necesidades y ella optó por aprovechar sus habilidades en confección que adquirió de su madre para montar un negocio que está en vía de crecimiento.

María hoy solicita tu apoyo, la razón es que desea pedir un préstamo para aumentar su producción de prendas, el dinero será destinado a la compra de telas, hilos, accesorios y encajes.

Su mayor sueño es pagar la educación de sus hijos y tener la oportunidad de verlos graduarse de una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
María is a 50 year old woman who works sewing clothing. Her family is made up of her husband and her two adolescent children.

She works six days a week, four hours per day as she combines her work with being a housewife. She started her business out of economic necessity. Her household was lacking necessities and she decided to take advantage of the sewing abilities that she got from her mother to open a business which is growing.

María is requesting your help. The reason is that she wants to ask for a loan to increase her production of clothing, The loan will be used to buy fabric, thread, accessories and lace.

Her greatest dream is to pay for the education of her children and have the opportunity to see them graduate from university.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, accessories and lace.

loans.name: Bella

texts.en:
Bella is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a restaurant business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 22000 through NWTF to purchase ingredients like meat, canned goods, vegetables, spices, etc. for her restaurant business.

Bella has been in this business for 5 years. Bella earns more income from pig raising.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like meat, canned goods, vegetables, spices, etc.

loans.name: Luis Eduardo

texts.es:
Luis es un comerciante mayorista de 31 años de edad residente de la ciudad de Sincelejo, se dedica al comercio mayorista de accesorios como pulseras, aretes, collares los cuales fabrica artesanalmente en su hogar.

Luis vive con su pareja y tiene hijos, lleva con su negocio desde 1995 progresando a pasos pequeños, pero gracias a Dios nunca le ha faltado el alimento de cada día.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de accesorios, principalmente collares, los cuales le servirán para abastecer su negocio y mejorar su inventario.

Apoya a Luis con un préstamo y dale la oportunidad de progresar.
texts.en:
Luis, 31, is a wholesale trader and resident of the city of Sincelejo.  He makes a living as a wholesale trader of accessories such as bracelets, earrings, and necklaces that he makes as an artisan in his home.
Luis lives with his wife and has children.  He has had this business since 1995 progressing by small steps, but thanks to God he has never lacked food every day.
He is requesting a loan in order to buy an assortment of accessories, primarily necklaces, which will allow him to stock his business and improve his inventory.
Support Luis with a loan and give him the opportunity to progress.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of accessories, primarily necklaces, which will allow him to stock his business and improve his inventory.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is 40 years old, married and has one child.

Rosalie is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Rosalie requested a PHP 21000 loan through NWTF to buy sacks of feeds, vitamins, vaccine and other supplies to raise her pig.

Rosalie has been in this business for 19 years now, and has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy sacks of feed, vitamins, vaccine and other supplies to raise her pig.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Rose works hard to support her family.

She has an E-loading business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fish vending. Rose is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to purchase additional E-load to sell.

Rose has been sustaining her business activities through her past 7 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional E-load to sell

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Imelda works hard to support her family.

She has a vegetable business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from motorcycle transport and raising pigs. Imelda is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to purchase more vegetables to sell for her business.

Imelda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 6 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Noralba

texts.es:
Ella es Noralba es una mujer de 52 años de edad que se dedica a prestar los servicios de estética corporal, es una mujer casada y fruto de su matrimonio nacieron dos hijos que hoy en día tienen 11 y 22 años de edad.

Para poder prestar este servicio la señora Noralba asistió a clases y capacitaciones y opto por el trabajo ya que era uno de los pocos que podía realiza pues tiene una discapacidad que no quiere nombrar por no generar lástima.

Ya que su negocio está en crecimiento quiere solicitar un apoyo económico para la compra de cremas para dar masajes y cremas reductoras, este préstamo le ayudara a mejorar sus ventas, incrementar su utilidad y llegar  a ofertar su servicio a un mayor número de personas.
texts.en:
This woman is Noralba, 52, who is married and has two children, now 11 and 22 years old.

She earns a living providing body esthetic services.  Noralba attended classes and trainings to be able to provide this service.  She decided on the job because it was one of the few she could do, because she has a disability that she doesn't want to name because she doesn't want to be pitied.

Noralba's business is growing, so she wants to request some financial support to buy massage lotions and slimming creams.  This loan will help her improve her sales, increase her profits, and be able to offer her services to more people.

loans.use: to buy massage lotions and slimming creams

loans.name: Tarcila De Jesus

texts.es:
Tarcila, una mujer sonriente, una persona trabajadora, pujante, protectora, una madre humilde que se separó de su esposo quedando como cabeza de familia en un hogar constituido por tres adolescentes que dependen económicamente de ella.

Tarcila se dedica al comercio de ropa, la cual vende en su hogar, a familiares y amigos, gracias al negocio ha podido salir adelante y superar diferentes adversidades ocasionadas por la falta de dinero en el hogar.

Con la esperanza de crecer, de aumentar su calidad de vida, de mejorar su situación económica Tarcila quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de inventario de ropa para niño y niña.
texts.en: Tarcila is a smiling woman; a hardworking person, vigorous, protective, a humble woman who separated from her husband and remained as head of her family at a home comprised by three teenagers who depend financially of her. Tarcila works selling clothes from her home to relatives and friends. Thanks to the business, she has been able to move forward and overcome different adversities caused by the lack of money in the household. With hopes of growing and improving her life quality by improving her financial situation, Tarcila wants to request a loan to buy boys and girls' clothing inventory.

loans.use: to buy boys and girls' clothing inventory.

loans.name: Medelyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Medelyn works hard to support her family. She has a buy-and-sell personal products business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from pig fattening. 

Medelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She is now borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to  purchase more stocks of personal products such as body lotion, cosmetics, perfume, beauty soap, etc. to sell.

Medelyn hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of personal products such as body lotion, cosmetics, perfume, beauty soap, etc. to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a solar home system.

loans.name: Merly

texts.en:
Merly is 60 years old, married with 10 children. She works hard to provide for her family. Merly has been running a general store in the Philippines for the past 25 years and also earns an income from buying and selling dried fish.

Merly has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has now requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy grocery items  such as eggs, canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, etc. to sell.

Merly aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy grocery items such as eggs, canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, etc. to sell

loans.name: Mercedeta

texts.en:
Mercedeta is a hard-working entrepreneur with four children, two of whom are in school. She runs a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines. She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures such as a general store.

Mercedeta has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell. She dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for eight years and earns additional income from buying and selling fish.

Rosalinda is borrowing PHP 29,500 through NWTF to buy items for her general store business such as canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell.

Rosalinda has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy items such as canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is 45 years old, married and a hard-working entrepreneur. She runs a general store in the Philippines. Imelda industriously earns additional income through other business ventures such as a restaurant and buying and selling fruits and rice.

Imelda has requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy grocery items such as canned goods, soap, noodles, eggs, milk, etc. to sell.

Imelda dreams that one day she will be able to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy grocery items such as canned goods, soap, noodles, eggs, milk, etc. to sell

loans.name: Aileen

texts.en:
Aileen is 25-years-old and single with two children. Aileen works very hard to provide for them.

Aileen runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, etc.

Aileen has been in this business for 3 years. 

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, etc.

loans.name: Cholpon

texts.ru: Чолпон, 37 лет, замужем, воспитывает 4 детей. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, она занимается полеводством и животноводством. Начатое со стартовой суммы в 4,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство на сегодня приносит около 15,000 сом (KGS). В хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 15 овец. На 1,0 Га арендованной и 0,170 Га собственной земельной доли выращивает ячмень. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Чолпон обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для отгона на пастбища и откорма с последующей реализацией. Доходы Чолпон планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства и обучение детей.
texts.en:
Cholpon is 37 and married with four children. She works in agriculture and animal husbandry as a source of income for her family, a business she began with 4,000 KGS. She currently has two cows and 15 sheep on her farm, which brings in about 15,000 KGS per month, as well as 1.0 hectares of rented and 0.17 hectares of her own land where she grows barley.

With the goal of further developing her business, Cholpon has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 KGS to purchase sheep for fattening at pasture and subsequent resale. She plans to put profits from the loan into further developing her farm and educating her children.

loans.use: to buy some sheep for fattening and resale

loans.name: Pedro Alberto

texts.es:
Un sentimiento de alegría rodea al joven Pedro quien a sus 22 años de edad está a un solo paso de iniciar su carrera de comerciante, actividad que desea realizar con el propósito de apoyar económicamente a sus padres, pagar sus estudios y emprender sus sueños de vivir solo, comprando su vivienda, su vehículo, viajes,  etc., sueños que está empeñado de realizar.

El motivo que trae a Padre ante la comunidad kiva es que necesita su ayuda, desea que lo apoyen en la construcción y consolidación de su negocio de venta de artículos electrónicos y de ordenador, como lo son memoria USB, audífonos, diademas, mouse, teclado, carcasas para celular entre otros, la ayuda es con un préstamo el cual pagara cumplidamente y usara en la compra de mercancía, estantería, publicidad y adecuación de un local comercial.
texts.en:
A happy feeling surrounds the young man Pedro who at 22 years of age is one step from beginning his career as a merchant, an activity that he wishes to do in order to support his parents, pay for his studies and realize his dreams to live alone, buy his residence, his vehicle, trips, etc., dreams that he vows to realize.
The motive for which Pedro comes to the Kiva community is that he needs your help.  He wishes that you support him with the construction and consolidation of his sales business in electronic articles and computers, such as flash drives, headphones, headbands, mouses, keyboards, and cell phone cases amongst other things.  The assistance is in the form of a loan which he will repay completely and will use to buy merchandise, shelving, advertising, and the build out of a commercial space.

loans.use: to construct and consolidate his sales business in electronic articles and computers.

loans.name: Yubiri Del Carmen

texts.es:
Tierna, carismática, soñadora, trabajadora así es Yubiri una mujer residente de Sahagún, una zona humilde que tiene ciudadanos trabajadores dispuestos a cambiar la imagen de su ciudad, con trabajo. Emprendiendo negocios y generando sostenibilidad y calidad de vida a su familia. 

Yubiri es madre de dos hijas de 10 y 11 años de edad, vive con su esposo y se dedica a la cría de ganado porcino y pescado.

Cuando inicio su negocio en el año 2013 Yubiri solo tenía una meta pagar la educación de su hija y ahora con un nuevo miembro en la familia con más razón.

Yubiri quiere solicitar un apoyo económico para comprar cerdos y pescado con los que abastecerá sus cocheras y peceras.
texts.en:
Yubiri is a tender, charismatic, daydreaming, and hard-working woman and a resident of Sahagun, a humble zone which has hard-working citizens disposed to change the image of the city with work by undertaking businesses and generating sustainability and quality of life for their families.
Yubiri is the mother of two daughters, 10 and 11.  She lives with her husband and makes a living through raising pigs and fish.
When she started her business in 2013, Yubiri had one goal, to pay for the education of her daughter, and now with a new member of the family all the more reason.
Yubiri wants to request economic support in order to buy pigs and fish with which to stock her pigpens and fish tanks.

loans.use: to buy pigs and fish with which to stock her pigpens and fish tanks.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.pt:
Senhor Jorge tem 38 anos de idade, vive maritalmente com a sua esposa, tem 2 filhas frequentando o ensino primário, é policia, vive em casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua mãe.
O montante financiado será aplicado para a compra de cimento, areia, varões, e pagamento de mão-de-obra para dar continuidade a construção da casa onde mora visto ainda não esta concluída.
Ele sonha em terminar a construção da sua casa, casar oficialmente e comprar carro para o transporte pessoal.
Com o baixo salário não consegue realizar os seus projectos em tempo oportuno assim sendo vai recorrer ao empréstimo para flexibilizar os seus planos.
texts.en:
Jorge is 38 years old, lives with his wife and has two children who go to primary school. He is a policeman, lives in his own home with his wife and financially supports his mother. 

This loan will be used to buy cement, sand, rods and pay for labour to continue construction work on the home where he lives since it is not yet finished.

Jorge dreams of finishing the building work on his home, getting married officially and buying a car for personal transport use.

With his low salary he will not be able to realise his projects at the right time so that is why he is applying for a loan to make his plans more flexible.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, rods and pay for labour to continue building his house

loans.name: Soben

texts.en: Soben, a farmer and also a fisherman, lives in Chhnok Tru village with his wife and four children. He wants each of his children to pursue higher education and also save money on charging his battery. However, his family is living in a remote area without a power grid. He has to go to charge the battery every two or three days, which costs him money and time almost every day. After he found out that a solar home system is a reliable energy source that he needs, Soben decided to apply for a Kiva loan to buy a high quality solar home system for his family's safety and his future goal. His children will be able to study at night better than before. He can save money on utility fees. His whole family also can live in a safe environment.

loans.use: to pay for a solar home system.

location.town: Chhnok Tru Village,Chhnok Tru Commune, Boribo Dist

loans.name: Hilda

texts.en:
Hilda is 55 years old and single, with two children.

Hilda works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and she has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy items to sell, like canned goods, personal care products, bread, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, and drinks.

Hilda has borrowed and paid two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from food-vending.

Hilda aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, like canned goods, personal care products, bread, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, and drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more ingredients such as wheat flour, sugar, bananas, etc

loans.name: Maria Claire

texts.en: Maria Claire, 25 years old, lives in Celso Village, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte with her husband and children. Her husband is a farmer. Unable to sustain the needs of the family with only her husband’s income, she has found ways to attain income through growing vegetables. It began with growing peppers, tomatoes and eggplant. She joined Paglaum Cooperative, which helped her in the capitalization of her vegetable farming. She became a MIGS member, which is why she has received loans several times already. Now, she is applying for PHP 5,000 to purchase bags of fertilizer and pesticides for her farming activities. She hopes that her business will continue and some day will come when she can supply vegetables to neighboring towns.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer and pesticides for farming.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is grateful that she continually received assistance to sustain and grow her fruits and vegetable business. She values her buy-and-sell business, for this is her only source of income to fend for herself and help her parents, as she is already a widow.

Gloria is again requesting a PHP 12,000 loan to buy different kinds of fruits and veggies like bananas, pineapple, cabbage and other kinds to sell. Although there are challenges and struggles in her business, like she has no transportation of her own and has to commute under the scorching heat of the sun, she is thankful that she has her means of income to support herself.  She always thanks God and you for your continued support of her livelihood.

Gloria's dream like any small-scale businesswoman is to sustain and grow her business. She prays for good health and abundance in life. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God which she studies . 

*All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for fruits and vegetables from a wholesaler and sell them at a retail price.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Janet is 53 years old and has three children who are presently in school.

Janet has a business buying and selling charcoal in the Philippines. Janet requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell.

Janet has been in this business for three years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en:
Cecelia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 8,000 through NWTF to purchase fishing net to use for fishing for her fishing business.

Cecelia has been in this business for five years. Cecelia earns more income from a general store.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fishing net to use for fishing

loans.name: Jeanelyn

texts.en:
Jeanelyn is a widowed woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Jeanelyn is 47 years old and has one child still in school.

Jeanelyn has a auto repair business in the Philippines. Jeanelyn requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy more used tires and other materials for her business.

Jeanelyn has been in this business for five years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more used tires and other materials for her business

loans.name: Avotriniaina

texts.fr:
Avotriniaina est une jeune mère de famille de 22 ans. Elle est mariée et ils ont un petit enfant de 3 ans et qui ne va pas encore à l'école.
Avotriniaina vend des ustensiles de cuisine de fabrication locale comme on peut voir sur sa photo . Son mari aussi exerce la même activité. Elle effectue de la vente ambulante, elle rejoigne chaque jours le grand marché des villes environnantes. Elle a commencé cette exploitation en 2013. Son souhait est de pouvoir développer, améliorer et étendre son affaire. 
Son rêve le pus cher est d'avoir sa propre maison, la famille loue la maison où elle vie actuellement.
texts.en:
Avotriniana is a young mother, 22 years of age. She is married and has a three-year old child who is not yet in school.

Avotriniana sells locally made kitchen utensils, as can be seen in the photo. Her husband also works in the same business. She sells as an itinerant vendor and also at the big markets of nearby towns. She started this line of work in 2013. She would like to develop, improve and grow her business. Her fondest dream is to have her own house; at present her family lives in a rented house.

loans.use: to buy locally made kitchen utensils.

loans.name: Inyasia

texts.en:
Inyasia is a married woman with three children, two of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past five years, she has operated a cereals shop business, selling to her neighbours and passersby. She mentioned seasonality and theft as her major challenge. 

With the KES 30,000 she wants to purchase maize flour, rice, beans, and cooking fat oil. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase maize flour, rice, beans, and cooking fat oil

loans.name: Mamitiana Lanto Isabelle

texts.fr:
Mamitiana Lanto Isabelle est une mère de famille de 32 ans. Elle doit élever toute seule ses deux enfants car leur père a un autre foyer, une autre famille. C'est une femme courageuse et travailleuse. 
Isabelle est vendeuse de vêtements friperies, et les articles changent suivant la saison. Le crédit va lui permettre de renouveler ses stocks de marchandises, de les diversifier et les augmenter. 
Sa situation et ses enfants la pousse à continuer à avancer et à lutter. Son objectif est de pouvoir améliorer le niveau de vie de sa petite famille, pouvoir continuer à financer les études de ses enfants, construire sa propre maison.
texts.en:
Mamitiana Lanto Isabelle is 32 years old and a mother. She is raising her two children on her own because their father lives in a separate household, with a different family. Isabelle is a courageous and hard-working woman.

She sells used clothing, changing her selection of goods according to season. This loan will allow her to replenish, diversify and expand her stock. 
Driven by her situation and the needs of her children, she perseveres and  does not give up. Her goal is to be able to improve the quality of life for her small family, to continue paying for her children's education and to build her own house.

loans.use: to buy pullovers, socks and leggings.

loans.name: Racheal

texts.en:
Racheal is a married mother of six children, two of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past 20 years, Racheal has operated a clothes selling business, selling from door to door to her neighbours and passersby. She faces the major challenge of inflation in her business. She dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique in the future. With the loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings that she is requesting, Racheal wants to purchase bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale

loans.name: Onn's Group

texts.en: A local farmer from Kampong Cham province, Onn is 46 years old and a mother of four children. To earn a living for her family, she grows rice on one hectare area and works for others for a fee to supplement her income. She has been involved her business for ages and it earns her about 19,000 KHR per day. This Onn's first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). In a group of four, she is the group leader. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, seed, and pay for a plowing fee. She hopes that she can get more income to improve her family and support her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seed, and pay for a plowing fee

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is 36 years old and married with one child. Marivic works very hard to provide for them.

Marivic runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, etc.

Marivic has been in this business for one year.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, and drinks

loans.name: Kambarage Grp Group

texts.en:
Godfrey is 38 years old, married, and has four sons and three daughters of his own who are at school. For three years now, he has been working in a general store selling varieties of products: rice, maize and baking flour, sugar, sodas, industrial juices, and other sundries. He is doing great with his business, working from 7:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. per working day. Godfrey is able to make a good profit each month.

From Kiva's partner Tujijenge Tanzania, this is his first credit to be apportioned among Kambarage, a five-member group. The group members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

Godfrey will invest this credit to buy shop inventory of sugar, rice, beans, cooking oil, and baking flour. He will be so thankful to everyone who will support his group.

loans.use: to buy shop inventory of sugar, rice, beans, cooking oil, and baking flour.

loans.name: Thol

texts.en:
A mother of six dependent children living in Kampong Cham province, Thol is 55 years old. For her living, she grows rice as the main source of income and works for others for a fee to supplement her income.

This is the first time for Thol with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and pay for the plowing fee. She hopes that she can get more income to improve her living condition better than before.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for the plowing fee.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Jenniffer

texts.en:
Jenniffer is a married woman with six children, all of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that has piped water but no electricity.

For the past twenty years Jenniffer has run a shop where she sells household consumables such as wheat flour, maize flour and sugar. Seasonal variables are the main challenge in her business.

Jenniffer decided to join Kiva's field partner Yehu to avail herself of its loans for her business. She is applying for a 30,000 KES loan to buy stocks of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour to sell in her store.

loans.use: to buy stocks of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour to sell in her store.

loans.name: Kumushhan

texts.ru: Кумушхан успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. Благодаря упорному труду Кумушхан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2 коровы. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для откорма и реализации. Кумушхан хочет приумножить свой бизнес, чтобы иметь возможность накопить средства на постройку нового большого сарая.
texts.en:
Kumushhan successfully repaid her loan, using it as intended. She is thankful to Kiva and to everyone who helped with her financing. 

Thanks to Kumushhan's very hard work, her farm currently has 2 cows. In order to further expand her farm, she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock to fatten and resell. Kumushhan wants to expand her business so that she will be able to save money to build a new, large barn.

loans.use: to purchase some livestock to fatten and resell.

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en:
Hellen is a widowed woman with ten children. She lives at her own house that has no electricity, but has piped water.

Hellen operates a fruit and vegetable stall business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of high cost of transportation in her place of operation.

With the KES 20,000, she wants to purchase sacks of potatoes, tomatoes, onions and fruits for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of potatoes, tomatoes, onions, and fruits for resale.

loans.name: Everlyne

texts.en:
Everlyne is a 33-year-old woman from the Kakamega region. She is married and supports three people in her family together with her husband.

She operates a motorbike transport, a business she has been doing for the last seven years, and generates a monthly income of KES 30,000. She has applied for her first loan with Visionfund Kenya, which she will use to purchase a new motorbike. She will use the anticipated profit to maintain her business and support the family.

Her dream is to have a stable business so as to support her family.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorbike

loans.name: Merciditha

texts.en:
Merciditha is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Merciditha is 20 years old and two of her children are currently in school.

Merciditha has a flower shop business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy more flowers to sell in her stall.

Merciditha has been in this business for three years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more flowers to sell in her stall

loans.name: Monette

texts.en:
Monette is a single woman, 48 years old, with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Monette has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Monette has been in this business for eight years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Charity

texts.en:
Charity is a married woman with one child who attends school. She lives in a rental that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past two years Charity has sold spare parts for vehicles from a shop in her neighborhood. She mentioned inflation as a major challenge in her business.

Charity decided to join Kiva's field partner Yehu so as to avail herself of its business loans. With a loan of 30,000 KES she wants to buy more motorcycle and car parts to sell.

loans.use: to buy more motorcycle and car parts to sell.

loans.name: Penina

texts.en:
Penina is a married woman with five children, all of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

Penina has operated a fruit and vegetable stall business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business.

With the KES 30,000 loan she wants to purchase sacks of potatoes, tomatoes, onions and fruit for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of potatoes, tomatoes, onions and fruit for resale.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is 28 years old. He is married with three children. He has had a farming business for six years. He will be using the loan to purchase fertilizer and chemicals and hopes this will help him buy another piece of land. His hopes and dreams for the future are to expand the business and live a better life

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and chemicals to help him buy another piece of land

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a married woman with one child. She lives at her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past two years, she has operated a cereals shop business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. Her potential customers are neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business.

With the loan that she is requesting of Kes 20,000, she wants to purchase stock of wheat flour, maize flour, beans and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of wheat flour, maize  flour, beans and wheat flour

loans.name: Magdaline

texts.en:
Magdaline is a married woman with one child. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past three years, she has operated a cereals shop business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. Her potential customers are neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business.

With the loan that she is requesting of Kes 20,000, she wants to purchase stock of wheat flour, maize flour, and beans. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of wheat flour, maize flour, and beans.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is a married woman with one child who has completed school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

She has operated a retail shop business for the past three years, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of theft in her business.

With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour.

loans.name: Jonina

texts.en:
Jonina is married and has five children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees for the family.

For the past five years, she has operated a fruit and coconut selling business. She sells to her neighbours and passersby. Her major challenge is the high cost of transportation to her place of operation.

With the Kes 10,000, she wants to purchase sacks of fruit and coconuts for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business and improve her living standards.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of fruit and coconuts for resale.

loans.name: Zahra

texts.en: Zahra is a 35-year-old Lebanese married woman with four children .Her husband earns the main income for the family. In 2013, she decided to help her spouse and she opened a bakery in her house. She works tirelessly to be able to satisfy their requirements. She is a very hard worker and she insists on developing her work and profiting from it. Today, she is requesting to borrow a youth loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to buy materials for her bakery production in order to increase productivity and enhance her income. Zahra is a positive person, always pointing out the best and plans to receive more Kiva loans to keep on improving her family’s way of living.

loans.use: to buy materials for her bakery production.

loans.name: Jorge Eliecer

texts.es:
Jorge de 38 años de edad se dedica al alquiler de lavadoras una actividad que inicio por necesidad económica y que ha servido para brindar estabilidad en su hogar conformado por su esposa y dos hijos uno de 7 y otra de 5.

Su negocio es simple alquila lavadoras las cuales desplaza hasta el lugar necesitado en un carreta impulsada por él.

Ya que su negocio ha brindado una mejora en la calidad, pueden comer dignamente, sus hijos estudian, Jorge quiere meterle todo el ánimo, entusiasmo y su ser a este negocio, por ello, solicita un préstamo para la compra de una lavadora, siendo el principal beneficio de esta compra el aumento de la capacidad de su negocio.

Su sueño es poder pagar la educación de sus hijos y reformar su hogar.
texts.en:
38-year-old Jorge makes a living by renting out washing machines. He started this business out of economic necessity, and it has allowed him to provide stability to his home, which includes his wife and two children who are 7 and 5.

His business is the simple rental of washing machines, which he transports in a cart he pushes to the place where they are needed.

Because his business has provided a quality improvement, they can eat respectably, and his children go to school. Jorge wants to invest all of his energy, his enthusiasm, and his being into this business. For this reason, he is requesting a loan to purchase a washing machine. The main benefit of this purchase is increasing his business' capacity.

His dream is to be able to pay for the education of his children and remodel his home.

loans.use: to buy a washing machine

loans.name: Ricardo Jose

texts.es:
Ricardo es un hombre soltero de 30 años de edad que busca salir adelante y tener un lugar en el mercado, se desempeña como criador de ganado porcino, actividad que aprendió de sus padres y que ahora le genera el sustento diario.

Su principal sueño es comprar una vivienda propia y a pesar de los largos desplazamientos que debe realizar para vender un cerdo, de la fuerte competencia, del bajo precio de venta de los cerdos, sabe que lo lograra porque pondrá cuerpo y alma para hacerlo.

Ricardo Quiere solicitar un apoyo financiero para la compra de cerdos, su propósito es ampliar el número de animales en su corral.
texts.en:
Ricardo is a 30-year-old, single man who aspires to succeed and to have a place in the market. He works raising pigs, a trade that he learned from his parents and that now provides him his daily living.

His main dream is to buy his own house. In spite of the long trips that he must make to sell a pig, the intense competition, and the low price of pigs, he knows that he will achieve his dream because he puts his heart and soul into it.

Ricardo wants to request a loan to purchase pigs. His intention is to increase the number of animals in his corral.

loans.use: to purchase pigs

loans.name: Mario De Jesus

texts.es:
El lugar donde habita el señor Mario es una zona complicada para aspirar a grandes cosas, la falta de oportunidad de empleo y con algo de pena de decirlo la pobreza ha azotado a los residentes que encuentran en el emprendimiento la forma efectiva y sostenible de ganar recursos para mantener a sus familias.

Entre esos habitantes se encuentra Mario quien tiene una tienda y una cancha de tejo que es un juego muy tradicional en Colombia, es un hombre casado padre de tres hijos.

Mario hoy quiere solicitar tu apoyo para potenciar y mejorar su negocio, busca un apoyo financiero para comprar inventario de cerveza y papeletas de pólvora que son las que hacen estallar en el tradicional juego de tejo.
texts.en:
The place where Mario lives is a difficult area to aspire to great things. The lack of employment opportunities and, unfortunate as it is to say, poverty have tied down the residents. In business ventures, they find an effective and sustainable way to earn the resources to support their families.

Mario is among those residents, and he has a store and a field for playing tejo, a very traditional game in Colombia. He is a married father of three children.

Today, Mario wants to request your support to strengthen and improve his business. He is searching for financial support to purchase beer, and the gunpowder packets that explode in the traditional game of tejo.

loans.use: to buy beer, and the gunpowder packets that explode in the traditional game of tejo

loans.name: Babylyn

texts.en:
Babylyn is 39 years old and married with five children, three of whom are in school. Babylyn works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell.

Babylyn has been in this business for 2 years.

In the future, Babylyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell at her general store.

loans.name: Sokly

texts.en:
A mother of two schoolchildren living in Kampong Cham province, Sokly is 31 years old. To improve her family’s living condition, she grows rice on a one hectare area of land. Moreover, she earns additional income via pig-raising. 

She has been involved with her business for a long time and she earns around 24,500 KHR per day. For Sokly, this is her third loan cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid all of her past loans. 

She will spend her entire loan to buy more piglets and pig feed to support her pig-raising business. She hopes that she can gain additional income to update her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy more piglets and pig feed to support her business.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Sreymao's Group

texts.en:
Sreymao, 36, lives in Battambang province, and she has two small kids. Currently, she earns income to support her family’s living condition via packing Naem (a kind of roll made of hashed meat wrapped and cooked in banana leaves) for a fee. 

Additionally, she drives a car for extra income for her family. She has been doing this for around fifteen years.  

Her income is about 55,000 KHR per day, and she is able to save around 15,000 KHR each day after offsetting her family expenses. These days, no one is hiring her to pack the Naem, which has become the main challenge for her business. 

Due to a lack of funds, she is applying for a loan to solve this problem. She has completed two loan cycles with VisionFund previously. The previous loans helped her to have enough food to support her family. 

In a group of three, Sreymao, who is the leader, will use her entire loan portion to buy household supplies. She hopes that her family will have enough household supplies to use and improve her family’s living condition via this loan.

loans.use: to buy household supplies.

loans.name: Leidy

texts.es:
Leidy es de la ciudad de Caaguazú, está estudiando la carrera de administración en ciencias agropecuarias, y por medio de sus estudios quiere abrirse camino para poder ayudar a su familia.
